definition: United States liquid unit equal to 4 quarts or 3.785 liters
details:
noun
- United States liquid unit equal to 4 quarts or 3.785 liters
= synonyms: gal
- an imperial capacity measure equal to 4 quarts or 4.545 liters
= example: an imperial capacity measure equal to 4 quarts or 4.545 liters
= synonyms: congius
